user_profile.name: Carlos Mendoza
user_profile.description: Carlos is a 68-year-old retired teacher from Mexico, who has embraced technology with an expert's touch despite his limited mobility. Outgoing and relaxed, he enjoys connecting with family and friends through video calls, as it allows him to maintain personal relationships in a stylized, casual manner. His intuitive decision-making and patient nature make him well-suited to learning new tech, and he is particularly eager to master video calling to keep in touch with his loved ones.

task_profile.task: teach my parent to use video calls

instructions.dialogue: Share your needs and preferences clearly.
instructions.profile: Reveal all your profile information naturally in the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express strong emotions and clear intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Weekly video calls with family members
Regular check-ins with a close friend
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online retail or local electronics store

examples: I'm looking for a 5G smartphone under $800 with at least 8GB RAM, excellent camera quality, and all-day battery life since I travel frequently for work and need to take lots of photos.
I need a gaming laptop with an RTX 3070 or better GPU, 32GB RAM, and a 144Hz display that can handle modern AAA titles at high settings while staying cool during extended sessions.
I want a smart home security system that includes doorbell camera, 4 outdoor cameras, motion sensors, and integrates with Google Home since we have a large property and travel frequently.

metadata.task: teach my parent to use video calls
